column1: Aichach (German pronunciation: [ˈaɪçax] (listen)) is a town in Germany
column2: located in the Bundesland of Bavaria and situated just northeast of Augsburg. It is the capital of the district of Aichach-Friedberg. The municipality of Aichach counts some 20
column3: 000 inhabitants. It is not far from the motorway that connects Munich and Stuttgart
column4: the A8. The local river is called Paar. Bavaria's only women's prison was established in Aichach in 1909.

column1: Aichach's history dates back nearly 1000 years.
